coup

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • coup.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimplePlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    Maintains player state as known to all players. As the identity of each card is not shared, the number in hand is a strategic target referred to as influence. Player notifies observers when amount of coins or influence changes.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String name)
      Player starts with 2 coins and 2 influence according to vanilla rules.

      Initialise player with custom amount of coins and influence
